attributes.action: refuse the extradition request from the USA in respect of Gary McKinnon as any alleged crime was committed on British soil
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is no valid reason for Gary McKinnon to be sent to the USA for trial.  This is not an extradition because it is a fundamantal tenet of justice that the accused should be tried where the crime was alleged to have been committed.  If this action proceeds it is nothing less than state-sanctioned kidnapping.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
